channel.title: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!
channel.description: hello, i have a 317 server. if i eat food the hp wont go up. (delta based) . the food works but the hp wont go up. pelas somebody help me with this!

item.title: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!

item.source: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!

item.title: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[code=java]case 385:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) {
return;
}
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (c.eatemote == 0){
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
}
c.sM(“You eat the shark.”);
c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1);
c.playerLevel[3] += 20;

    if (c.playerLevel[3] > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) {
            c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
    }
    c.setSkillLevel(3, c.playerLevel[3], c.playerXP[3]);
    break;[/code]

item.title: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
			return;
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();	
			if(c.currentHealth <= 0) {
			break;
			}
			c.currentHealth += 10;
			if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
				c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
			c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016);
			c.deleteItem(4049, slot, 1);
			break;

item.title: Help ! if i eat food the hp wont go up!
item.dc:creator: @bilal-slb bilal-slb
item.description:
@bilal-slb wrote:

its liek this but what i need to change pleas help

case 385:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);}
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the shark.”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
c.sM(“It heals some health.”);
}
if(c.currentHealth <= 20) {
break;
}
c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1);
c.currentHealth += 20;
if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
break;

c.currentHealth += 10; //set to your amount of HP to add…
